title: Executive Order 7829-Revocation of Executive Order No. 5428 of August 20, 1930, Withdrawing Land for Classification and in Aid of Legislation
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847, Executive Order No. 5428 of August 20, 1930, temporarily withdrawing and reserving certain land for classification and in aid of legislation, is hereby revoked.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7829-Revocation of Executive Order No. 5428 of August 20, 1930, Withdrawing Land for Classification and in Aid of Legislation Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368725
